notes.deduplication: Normalize by canonical_url, title hash, and published_at timestamp.
notes.polling_recommendation: Wire feeds (Reuters/AP) every 1–5 minutes; analysis outlets every 15–60 minutes.
notes.paywalls: FT, Economist, NYT, WSJ often paywalled — show headline + summary and link to original unless licensed.
notes.attribution: Always display source badge and link to canonical_url to respect copyright and provenance.
